icon-picker-dialog.base64-hint: Tignitin n usettenggel n Base64 i d-yettaken abrid fessusen akken ad ternuḍ kra n tignit ɣer wumuɣen-ik·im. Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ ameẓlu am [www.base64-image.de]({{link}} iwakken ad tselkteḍ tugna i tebɣiḍ ɣer uzrar yettwasetgel s base64. Annect-a yettedu ula i tugniwin gift imrayen!
icon-picker-dialog.reload-button-tooltip: Ales asali n isental n tignitin meṛṛa
icon-picker-dialog.hint: Lmed [dagi]({{link}}) amek ara ternuḍ neɣ ad d-tesnulfuḍ isental-ik·im n tignit.

achievements-dialog.reset-confirmation-title: D tidet tebɣiḍ ad talseḍ awennez n usfari?
achievements-dialog.reset-confirmation-message: Akk iseḍruyen d ufara n yiswiren ad ruḥen. Tigawt-agi ulamek ara ad tettwasemmet.
achievements-dialog.title: Iseḍruyen
achievements-dialog.no-completed-achievements: Mazal ur tfukkeḍ ara akk yakan iseḍruyen.
achievements-dialog.reset-button-tooltip: Ales awennez n meṛṛa n iseḍruyen d usfari n iswiren

settings.restore-general-settings-warning-title: D tidet tebɣiḍ ad d-terreḍ iɣewwaṛen imuta?
settings.restore-general-settings-error-title: Yecceḍ usali n aḥraz n yiɣewwaren imuta!
settings.restore-general-settings-success-message: Iɣewwaṛen-ik·im imuta ttwarran-d seg ufaylu n weḥraz.
settings.restore-menu-settings-warning-title: D tidet tebɣiḍ ad d-terreḍ iɣewwaṛen n wumuɣ?
settings.restore-menu-settings-warning-message: Ayagi ad isemselsi umuɣen-ik·im amiran akked tigrummiwin n wumuɣen s igburen n ufaylu n weḥraz yettwafernen!
settings.restore-menu-settings-error-title: Yecceḍ usali n weḥraz n wumuɣen!
settings.restore-menu-settings-success-message: Umuɣen-ik·im akked tigrummiwin n wumuɣ ttwarran-d seg ufaylu n weḥraz.
